com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware

Class DualController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
        • com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware.Controller
          • com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware.DualController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.parsing.IDevice, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.parsing.IInputOutput

    public class DualController
extends Controller
    Controller representing a Dualstick controller. Mainly provides convenience methods for getting axis instead of using the twist and rotation axes for the second stick.
    Author:
    Ross Gongaware

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DualController(int port)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DualController

        public DualController(int port)
        Creates a dual stick controller from a certain port with the standard 12 buttons from a logitech dual action. Same as calling

        DualController (port, 12)

        Parameters:
        port - The port that the dualstick resides.

      • DualController

        public DualController(int port,
              int numButtons)
        Creates a dual stick with any number of buttons.
        Parameters:
        port - The port which the controller resides
        numButtons - The number of buttons on the controller.

    • Method Detail

      • getLeftAxis

        public double getLeftAxis(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick.AxisType axis)
        Gets either the x of y axis on the left stick.
        Parameters:
        axis - Either AxisType.kX or AxisType.kY
        Returns:
        The value of said axis on the left stick.

        public double getRightAxis(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick.AxisType axis)
        Gets either the x of y axis on the right stick.
        Parameters:
        axis - Either AxisType.kX or AxisType.kY
        Returns:
        The value of said axis on the right stick.
